amendment.description: Amendment to the Wilson substitute amendment (A011) to the Miller (FL) amendment (A010) sought to reduce funding to the new independent states of the former Soviet Union by $327 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Wilson substitute amendment, to reduce funds for the former Soviet states by $296.8 million, to $298.2 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hefley amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 320 (Roll no. 425).
